Description: Stamp (vessel): half-qisṭ. With four line Kufic inscription and a 6 pointed star at the end of the third line. Made of green glass. Damaged at bottom.
Curator's comments: From the same die as OA+ 4330, OA+ 4331, and 1893,0205.87. All have Usāma's half-qisṭ stamps.
Bibliographic references: Morton 1985 / A Catalogue of Early Islamic Glass Stamps (7)
Associated names: Named in inscription: Usāma b. Zayd
